ygData.subject: Re: Hunting at LVL 35
ygData.msgSnippet: yeah.. a bit heavy. But Damage: 25 Delay: 40 is a very nice damage ratio. 1.6. Sure at later level there can be better but... it s a 1h slash that deals
ygData.messageBody:
yeah.. a bit heavy. But Damage: 25 Delay: 40 is a
very nice damage ratio. 1.6.<br><br>Sure at later
level there can be better but... it's a 1h slash that
deals a hefty punch. I find with Dual wield... I like
to have something with a large kick in the primary
and something super fast in the secondary. That way
dual wield usually activates more (course it's been a
while since I've played a warrior with dual wield...
maybe they've changed it. Egad. Can it really be 2
years ago?)<br><br>But everyone has a different way of
playing. Wurmslayer also gives you +5 STR, +5 Magic
Resistance, 5 AC to compensate a bit for it's heaviness
though. 15 pounds but 5 str to me just means the item is
actually 10 pounds and gives you +5 mr and 5 ac to boot
with a 1.6 ratio. Not too shabby till you're 40 or 45.
Not what you'd want to train 1hs...
but.<br><br>shooman out<br><br>PS.. forgot to say. I hunted Ice
Giants, Cougars, and in OT as well till level 40. Still
sometimes hunt some IG's.
